summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1832, for the improvement of Boren Avenue North and Terry Avenue North, each from Denny Way to Mercer Street; Mercer Street; from Westlake Avenue North to Fairview Avenue North; and Fairview Avenue North, from Mercer Street to Roy Street, by constructing water mains therein of proper dimensions and materials, together with all gates, tees, crosses and other appurtenances necessary for the proper water service and fire protection of said district, under Ordinance No. 19024 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
